caption:
“Victory belongs to the steadfast.”

Reflection:
The battle is not to the swift, but to those who do not yield. Endurance outlasts every storm.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches perseverance — the quiet heroism of remaining faithful. The steadfast soul wins by standing firm in truth.
